page.title: 11Family Outings
page.content: Perhaps the most notable pastime of was{watching steam trains,}a thing of the past even in these times. These being run during the summer months for the steam enthusiast. A day out for the family is a visit to a{agricultural show}eg.Otley and Pateley Bridge. The big annual farming event in the area is the Great Yorkshire Show held in Harrogate in July. { Local day's out}are often into Beckwithshaw for the Village Gala, Bonfire Night celebrations, Annual Vegatable and Flower Show,Church Garden Party
